title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; talk to Ollama’s REST API with full typing.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user) packaged as a single Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with reactive streaming, model management and embedding support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Cookbook showing how to build a Chainlit chat app backed by any Ollama model in <30 lines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder components for pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; chat, manage models and view logs from the terminal.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing strongly-typed Ollama REST API with Tokio and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and Blazor sample for chatting with Ollama models via REST and SignalR streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines and dev environments.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, embed, generate).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane and can summarize or rewrite your notes locally.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem providing an ActiveModel-style interface to Ollama with Rails generators and background jobs.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s REST API with GenServer and LiveView examples for real-time chat.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel using slash commands.
